All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Character
Abstract representation of Heroes and Monsters
FightEndedNotification
Class that extend Notification and that might be use in the future to notify the player of the end of a fight
Gender
The enum that give the gender values
Global
Global attributes and methods that can be accessed everywhere
Hero
The abstract class that represent the Hero and extends Character
HeroEndedRegenNotification
Class that extend Notification and that is used to notify the player that a hero as finished regen
HeroesDeck
 
MagicalHero
the class that extends Hero and represent the MagicalHero
MagicalRace
Class that extend Race and implement the Races that relate with magic
MagicalRole
Class that extend Role and implement the roles that relate with magic
Main
the main class of the program
Monster
The clas that extends Character and represent the monster
MyInputException
Class that extends InputMismatchException that create an exception when there is a wrong input
Notification
The abstract class that represent the notification system
NotificationManager
The class that extend ArrayList and implements Showable
PhysicalHero
the class that extends Hero and represent the PhysicalHero
PhysicalRace
Class that extend Race and implement the Races that relate with physical things
PhysicalRole
Class that extend Role and implement the roles that relate with physical thing
Player
Holds the methods to interact in the game.
Race
Abstract class that the race that only heroes can have
Rarity
The enum that represent the rarity of a Hero
RegenJob
The class that implement Runnable and take care of the regen of heroes
Role
Abstract class that represent role that Heroes and Monster can have
Showable
Gives to classes two simple ways to render them in the terminal
Stat
Class that represent the stat
